document.full_text: the tampa bay lightning secured a spot in the nhl playoffs for the first time in four years with a 2-1 win over a wasteful pittsburgh penguins on thursday.
document.title: lightning edge pens to book playoff ticket
lines_and_colors: the tampa bay lightning secured a spot in the nhl playoffs for the first time in four years with a 2-1 win over a wasteful pittsburgh penguins on thursday.
